loader.title: Please wait while we prepare the menu.

welcome.title: Welcome!
welcome.subtitle: You are about to order at:

instructions.title: Instructions
instructions.subtitle: How to place your order on i menu?
instructions.instruction_1: Select products from the menu, press the product card
instructions.instruction_2: Once you've selected your products, press 'view product' to confirm your order
instructions.instruction_3: Make the payment for your order in cash or through MercadoPago
instructions.instruction_4: Your order will be on its way!
